description: The Kandy Kitchen Japanese Maple is an amazing plant species to add to any garden or landscape. With its red and white variegated leaves and orange-red fall color, it adds an impressive splash of color. It's an upright, rounded form and fast growth rate make it a dynamic feature, and it grows well in both full sun and partial shade, making it an extremely versatile species. This Japanese Maple does well in USDA Hardiness Zones 5-9, making it a "must-have" for any temperate garden. It is disease and pest resistant, and is relatively drought tolerant as well. With beautiful foliage and petite size, the Kandy Kitchen Japanese Maple is a great addition to any yard!
